profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete profile "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
profiles.noFields: No fields added yet. Click "Add Field" to start.
profiles.allFieldsAdded: All template fields are already added
profiles.freePlanHint: Free plan: up to {{maxProfiles}} profiles and {{maxFields}} fields per profile. Open the Billing tab to upgrade.

settings.title: Settings
settings.lockDescription: Require unlocking before autofill can be used
settings.autoLockDescription: Extension will automatically lock after this period of inactivity
settings.aiDescription: Use OpenAI to classify ambiguous form fields
settings.openaiKeyDescription: Your API key is stored locally and never shared
settings.aiModelDescription: Choose the OpenAI model for classification
settings.themeDescription: Choose light, dark, or auto (follows system)
settings.encryptionDescription: Profiles are encrypted locally on this device. Data never leaves your browser unless you export it.
settings.resetDescription: This will delete all profiles and reset all settings to default values. This action cannot be undone.
settings.resetConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all profiles and settings to default? All your data will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
settings.resetSuccess: All data has been reset to default

backup.title: Backup
backup.exportDescription: Export all profiles and settings to a file or clipboard
backup.importDescription: Import profiles and settings from a file or clipboard
backup.append: Append - Add imported profiles to existing ones

billing.title: Billing & License
billing.description: Pay once and use Autofill Pro on up to 2 browsers. You can always donate more to support development.
billing.emailRequired: Enter email you used/will use for payment
billing.clientIdMissing: Client ID is missing. Try restarting the extension.
billing.checkoutOpened: Checkout opened in a new tab
billing.checkoutError: Failed to open checkout. Try again later.
billing.notFound: Payment not found for this email yet. If you just paid, wait a bit and try again.
billing.slotsExceeded: License already used on all allowed devices.
billing.maxProfilesReached: Free plan limit reached: you can only create up to 2 profiles. Open the Billing tab to upgrade.
billing.maxFieldsReached: Free plan limit reached: you can only add up to 30 fields per profile. Open the Billing tab to upgrade.
billing.notPro: License for this email is not Pro.
billing.activated: License is now active on this browser
billing.deactivateError: Failed to deactivate license on this browser
billing.deactivated: License on this browser has been deactivated. You can now activate it on another browser.
billing.licenseRevoked: Your license was revoked on this device. Plan downgraded to Free.
billing.emailLinkedHint: Your Pro license is linked to your email and can be active on up to 2 browsers at the same time.
billing.hint:
Flow 1 (card): enter email → click "Pay with card" → complete payment → return here and press "Activate license on this browser".
Flow 2 (crypto): enter the same email → click "Pay with Telegram (CryptoBot)" → complete payment → return here and press "Activate license on this browser".

content.recordMode: Record mode: capturing inputs on change
content.noDataForField: No data for this field. Add an autofill rule?
content.hotkeyHint: ⌥⇧I to fill field • ⌥⇧F to fill form

addField.title: Add Custom Field
addField.description: Create a custom field mapping for this input
addField.fieldNameDescription: This name will be used to match the field in the future
addField.defaultValueDescription: This value will be used to fill this field
addField.uploadFileDescription: File will be stored as Base64
addField.fileTooLarge: File too large. Max 2 MB (current: {{size}} MB)
